sub_title: Supporting companies in GRC, CSR(D) & BPM
summary:
💬 About Albèrt Jourdan

Senior manager • Strategic thinker • Tactical player • Strong motivator • Solid • Selfmade • Slightly quirky

Demonstrable track record in SMEs, various business sectors and complex matrix organizations

Experienced professional in Governance, Risk & Compliance, Business Process Management, Operational Excellence, Quality, Health, Safety & Environment and Security Management

Subject Matter Expert in Corporate Social Responsibility, End-2-End Sustainability and CSRD disclosure requirements

Author of a practice book about CSR for SMEs in which Albèrt passionately promotes his contemporary ‘get started’ model for sustainable business and tries to be funny about serious stuff

#GRC #CSR #ESG #ESRS #BPM #OPX #EFQM #LEAN #QHSE #ISO9001 #ISO45001 #ISO14001 #TAPA

awards.title: Lean & Green Award 2012
awards.description: Lean & Green is een CO2 reductieprogramma vanuit de Nederlandse overheid waarbij deelnemers zich commiteren tot minimaal 20% CO2 reductie binnen een periode van maximaal 5 jaar. De Lean and Green aanpak van DPD Pakketservice betrekt circa 125 vervoersondernemers - die gezamenlijk zorgdragen voor alle bestel- en lijndiensten - in de transitie naar het rijden op biogas.

projects.title: Empower Center Bangladesh
projects.description:
The first 1We Empower Centre in Bangladesh is a fact. In the village of Rajihar in Barisal, about 120 km below the capital Dhaka, 3 shops and a learning workshop has been realized.

In the restaurant, the sewing shop and the energy- annex rickshaw shop 40 women and 12 men work together in cooperatives.

Please click on the project tile for more information about this and other 1We projects.

Tergos is the staffing specialist in the field of IT Infrastructure & Security and focuses on Architecture, Networking, Security, Microsoft, Cloud & DevOps and Governance, Risk & Compliance

Tergos is part of Vibe Group, a fast-growing international IT staffing and consulting organisation founded in 2011 by Daniël Visser en Bernd van Baars

It is Vibe Group’s purpose to create the future of IT by connecting highly skilled IT professionals to organisations

volunteer_experiences.role: Lid MVO Expertpanel / Member CSR Expert panel
volunteer_experiences.description:
Het MVO Expertpanel biedt de mogelijkheid om MVO professionals en besluitvormers te bevragen over de stand van zaken, trends, kansen en uitdagingen op het gebied van MVO.

De reacties van de panelleden kunnen leiden tot nieuwe inzichten, aanzet geven tot nieuw onderzoek en nieuwe informatie die wordt gebruikt in het Executive Program CSR.
-
The CSR Expert Panel offers the opportunity to ask CSR professionals and decision makers about the state of affairs, trends, opportunities and challenges in Corporate Social Responsibility.

The panel members' reactions can lead to new insights, initiate new research and new information used in the Executive Program CSR.

Helpen van kinderen met een taalachterstand
-
Helping children with a language deficiency

jourdan sustainability coaching heeft met Radboud Universiteit in Nijmegen samengewerkt aan het versnellen van duurzaam denken naar doen middels publicaties en presentaties over duurzaam ondernemen. Zie publicatie Duurzaam Denken Doen als uitkomst van het project 'Our Common Future 2.0'.
-
jourdan sustainability coaching worked together with Radboud University in Nijmegen to accelerate sustainable thinking to doing through publications and presentations on sustainable business. See publication Duurzaam Denken Doen (From Sustainable Thinking To Doing) as a result of the project 'Our Common Future 2.0'.
